group_1.textAvCenter: [fontSize:20]They're seriously going to fight that thing?

group_1.textAvRight: [fontSize:20]Homura, let's hit it all at once!
[fontSize:20]If three isn't enough,@then thirty... then three hundred...
[fontSize:20][flashEffect:flashWhite1][se:5007_shooting_05_s]However many I have to shoot to hit you!

group_1.progressFnarration: (She's right.)
(She's using magic way too fast.@Just look at her Soul Gem.)

group_1.textAvRight: [fontSize:20]No! We have to do this!@Sayaka... Mami...
[fontSize:20][flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeSmall][se:5007_shooting_05_s]They gave everything to protect@this city―so I will too!

group_1.progressFnarration: (That's incredible.)
(Her arrows overlap in frozen@time, winding together...)
(Condensing to a single point―@right at Walpurgisnacht!)
(Did it...work?!)

group_1.textAvRight: [fontSize:20]It's too soon to give up yet.

group_1.progressFnarration: (She's making a beeline...@Cutting right through them.)
(So, Miss Akemi...)
(What are you going to do?)
(You barely have@any magic left either.)
(If you're going to act...)
(Better make it count.)
(She...stopped time.)
(She used the very last of@her magic―for Miss Kaname.)

group_1.textAvLeft: [fontSize:20]Miss Tomoe, Miss Miki, Miss Sakura―@they were all dead.
[fontSize:20][flashEffect:flashWhite1][surround:8074_trigger]I was sure there was no way@we could win.
[fontSize:20]That fighting Familiars, trying to@save the city―all of it was pointless.
[fontSize:20]I thought the only choice was@to rewind time. Start over.
[fontSize:20][flashEffect:flashWhite1][surround:8074_trigger]I was about to walk away from you.@From THIS you, standing in front of me.
[fontSize:20]Even if I turn back time, everything we've been@through―that I remember about you―that's not a lie!
[fontSize:20]You're real.@And I―can't just leave you behind.

group_1.progressFnarration: (Miss Akemi...)
(Even from afar,@I could see it clearly.)
(You became a Magical Girl@for her sake.)
(You seized the power to control@time―just so you could save her.)
(All this time, I've just been@thinking about cutting my losses.)
(But you...you still couldn't bring@yourself to abandon Miss Kaname.)
(If this attack doesn't work,@that's it. Her magic's gone.)
(And the city falls with her...)
(And me with it, I guess.)
(Well. It's not like@I have a choice...)
(It's better than turning@into a Witch, anyway.)
(Her endless bullets...)
(They circle Walpurgisnacht from@all directions, like a lead sky.)

group_1.textAvRight: [fontSize:20]In the end...@we really couldn't win, huh.

group_1.Fnarration: (Miss Akemi and Miss Kaname lay@side by side in the wreckage―)
(Each holding a Soul Gem,@dark and clouded.@Turned toward each other,@as if to say goodbye.)

group_1.textAvRight: [fontSize:20]I guess...@this is the end for us too...

group_1.textAvLeft: [fontSize:20]Listen... How about the two@of us become monsters...
[fontSize:20]...and really mess up@this whole, awful world, huh?
[fontSize:20]Until there's no more evil,@no more sadness, nothing left at all.
[fontSize:20]Let's just break, break,@break it all to dust...!

group_1.progressFnarration: (Miss Akemi...)
(What's Miss Kaname@holding? Don't tell@me that's...)

group_1.textAvRight: [fontSize:20]I lied earlier.@I had just this one left.
[fontSize:20]Because I want to ask you to do...
[fontSize:20]Homura...@You can go back in time, right?
[fontSize:20]...so that it won't@end like this, right?
[fontSize:20]Then would you go back@and save stupid me...

group_1.textAvLeft: [fontSize:20]No matter how many times I have to go back@and try! I swear, I will protect you!

group_1.textAvRight: [fontSize:20]I...I don't want to become a Witch.
[fontSize:20]There are awful...sad things@in this world, but...
[fontSize:20]Homura, you...finally called me...@by my first name...

group_1.Fnarration: (Miss Akemi bit back her tears and@pointed the barrel of her gun at Miss Kaname.)

group_1.progressFnarration: (As I turned away from the@sound of the gunshot...)

group_1.Fnarration: (Kyubey's eyes met mine,@and I realized then that he was watching me.)
(Though it was with the@same empty expression as always...)
(...For a moment,@he seemed almost to be smiling.)

group_1.textAvCenter: [fontSize:20]I'll see you in the next loop, Mabayu.

group_1.progressFnarration: (As if shrugging off@the last of her doubts...)
[flashEffect:explosion](With a decisive movement,@she spun the hourglass@of her shield.)
(...And, taking me along with it,@the cycle begins anew.)
